entry.sentence: Whatever may happen , we are under the spell of this oath of love . ''

entry.deps: nsubj(happen-3, Whatever-1) aux(happen-3, may-2) advcl(are-6, happen-3) nsubj(are-6, we-5) root(ROOT-0, are-6) det(spell-9, the-8) prep_under(are-6, spell-9) det(oath-12, this-11) prep_of(spell-9, oath-12) prep_of(oath-12, love-14)

entry.sentence: `` Yes , Kathlen , whatever may happen . ''
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (FRAG (INTJ (`` ``) (UH Yes)) (, ,) (NP (NNP Kathlen))) (, ,) (NP (WDT whatever)) (VP (MD may) (VP (VB happen))) (. .) ('' '')))
entry.deps: discourse(Kathlen-4, Yes-2) dep(happen-8, Kathlen-4) nsubj(happen-8, whatever-6) aux(happen-8, may-7) root(ROOT-0, happen-8)
